name: NSPanel
desc: A special kind of window that typically performs a function that is auxiliary to the main window.

items.name: var isFloatingPanel: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the receiver is a floating panel.

items.name: var becomesKeyOnlyIfNeeded: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the receiver becomes the key window only when needed.

items.name: var worksWhenModal: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the panel receives keyboard and mouse events even when some other window is being run modally.
